# rawRepresentation

**Instance Property**

A raw data representation of a P-521 digital signature.

## Declaration

```swift
var rawRepresentation: Data
```

## Representing the signature

- **derRepresentation**: A Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation of a P-521 digital signature.
